name: My Pony princess
description:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.geckolor.games.ponyprincessdress

Once upon a time, there’s a wonderland with beauty and magic everywhere, it’s ponies’ world. The ponies spent a lot of time taking care of their appearance, so Pony Princess Salon has been opened. It’s amazing and professional. Play this funny game and have a relaxed time with beautiful ponies. Choose also a cute outfit, hairstyle and shoes for her because it’s pampering time. Let’s start!

★★★Features★★★

★ Enjoy the game in two mode:
+ Classic mode: Dress pony up to according to your taste. You can choose vary of backgrounds from gallery by tapping on the icon Leaf and keeping in 2 seconds. You can pinch, zoom, rotate and move model and background also.
+ Time mode: Try your memory to make her look like the model to get the highest score
★ Fun care steps for the Pony Princess
★ Beautiful hairstyles and tails
★ Colorful outfits incuding: cute dresses, tops, bottoms, shoes
★ Difference accessories: crown, …
★ Good sound effect
★ Take nice photos and share with people over Facebook, Twitter.. or save in gallery.
